title: Mantelpiece Clock

verbs: To measure or record the time, duration, or rate of.
Measure the time or duration of an event or action or the person who performs an action in a certain period of time
To measure the amount of time an object takes to complete a course (e.g., "to clock a race car").
nouns: A clock is an instrument to indicate, keep, and co-ordinate time.
A timepiece that shows the time of day
An instrument used to measure or keep track of time.
Instrument to measure or keep track of time.
An instrument used to measure or keep track of time; a non-portable timepiece.

description:
An antique-styled mantel clock with a flat base and rounded case, as made of wood and brass and placed above a fireplace.

Commonly used for various content concerning time. May also suggest a traditional home or old-time environment. 

Samsung’s design previously featured a more modern-looking, blue clock.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the mantelpiece clock emoji is a classic representation with a polished wooden casing and a prominent, ornate face.  Its detailed Roman numerals and elegant hands are rendered with realistic lighting and soft, rounded edges, projecting a sense of timelessness and tradition.  This emoji, with its gentle glow and sophisticated design on Apple devices, is frequently used to signify time passing, appointments, or the urgency of a deadline.
